title: Exploring Vision Language Pretraining with Knowledge Enhancement via Large Language Model

abstract: Abstract The integration of Vision-Language Pretraining (VLP) models in the medical field represents a significant advancement in the development of AI-driven diagnostic tools. These models, which learn to understand and generate descriptions of visual …
